definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: go to ruin (?), only der. spec. (NH Hiph. = BH, Ecclus. [[שחיתה]] Sir 30:11 corrupt act; Ar. sah.ata extirpate; Eth. sah.at’a: injure, violate; TelAm. šaḫâtu is fall (esp. of city), be prostrate (? of land), perh. Canaanism (v. Wkl:TelAm. Vocab.), As. poss. šêtu, flee, escape (cf. [[אבד]]); OAram. (Zinj.) [[שחת]] destroy Lzb:374, Aram. [[שְׁחַת]], 4ah.et. (assim. of t), multilate;—very improb. Gerber:179 denom. from [[שַׁחַת]]);—†
